text: Azure DevOps CICD Pipeline CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps This document describes how to build and deploy applications using YAML pipelines. Stages: build, test, publish artifacts, and deploy. Use service connections, variable groups, and approvals for production deployments. Common tasks: dotnet restore, dotnet test, dotnet publish, docker build and push.

Database Indexing Basics Database indexing basics Indexes speed up reads but can slow down writes. Use them for high-selectivity columns. Consider composite indexes for common query patterns. Monitor query plans and avoid over-indexing.

Docker Compose Tips Docker Compose tips Use docker-compose.yml to define multi-container applications. Define services, networks, volumes, and environment variables. For local development, mount source code as volumes and enable hot reload when possible.

Docker Deployment Guide Deploying a .NET service in Docker This guide explains how to containerize a .NET Web API using a Dockerfile and run it with docker compose. Key steps: write a Dockerfile, build the image, configure environment variables, expose ports, and run the container. Troubleshooting: port conflicts, missing ASPNETCORE_URLS, and volume mount permissions. Best practices: multi-stage builds, minimal base images, and health checks.

Incident Response Runbook Incident response runbook Steps for triage: confirm impact, identify scope, assign an incident commander, and start a timeline. Collect logs, metrics, and traces. Roll back if needed. Post-incident: write an RCA, define action items, and track them to completion.

Kubernetes Intro Kubernetes introduction Kubernetes orchestrates containers across a cluster. Core concepts: Pods, Deployments, Services, ConfigMaps, Secrets, and Ingress. Use readiness/liveness probes and resource requests/limits.

Semantic Search Overview Semantic search overview Semantic search uses vector embeddings to represent text meaning and retrieve relevant documents by similarity. A typical pipeline: split documents into chunks, compute embeddings, store vectors in an index, and search with a query embedding. Cosine similarity is common; approximate nearest neighbor search improves speed on large collections.

Vacation Policy Employee vacation policy Employees must request vacation at least 10 business days in advance. Approval depends on team capacity. Emergency leave is handled case by case. Carry-over rules: up to 5 days can be carried to the next year.

Корпоративна база знань регламент Регламент ведення корпоративної бази знань База знань містить технічну документацію, інструкції, регламенти та шаблони. Документи мають мати назву, автора, дату оновлення та короткий опис. Рекомендовано використовувати пошук за змістом (семантичний пошук), щоб знаходити інформацію навіть без точних ключових слів.

Налаштування Azure Functions Налаштування Azure Functions Функції можуть бути тригерами по HTTP, таймеру або черзі Service Bus. Рекомендації: використовувати managed identity, логування, retry політики. Деплой здійснюється через CI/CD пайплайн.
